line_work_sets.title: Intermediate Stances
line_work_sets.description: Stances required for 6th keup grading with movement

techniques.name: Walking Stance (Advanced)

direction_pattern.description: Step forward maintaining perfect walking stance balance and posture
Step backward maintaining walking stance, focus on consistent distance

key_points: Front foot pointing forward, back foot 15Â° outward
common_mistakes: Leaning too far forward or backward

techniques.name: L-Stance

direction_pattern.description: Step forward into L-stance, 70% weight on back leg
Step backward into L-stance, maintain proper weight distribution

key_points: 70% weight on back leg, 30% on front
Back foot perpendicular to front foot
common_mistakes: Equal weight distribution on both legs

line_work_sets.title: Intermediate Blocks
line_work_sets.description: Advanced blocking techniques for 6th keup level

techniques.name: High Block

direction_pattern.description: Step forward in walking stance, execute high block with opposite arm
Step backward in walking stance, execute high block with opposite arm

common_mistakes: Block too low - should protect head
Using inner forearm instead of outer

direction_pattern.description: Step forward, execute inner forearm block with opposite arm
Step backward, execute inner forearm block with opposite arm

line_work_sets.title: Basic Kicks
line_work_sets.description: Fundamental kicking techniques introduced at 6th keup

techniques.name: Front Snap Kick

direction_pattern.description: Step forward, execute front snap kick with rear leg
Step backward, execute front snap kick with rear leg

key_points: Snap kick with ball of foot

practice_notes.warmup: Complete thorough warmup including joint rotations and dynamic stretching, especially for hip flexibility needed for kicks
practice_notes.progression: Start with slow, controlled movements focusing on correct form before increasing speed
